comments.body: I think it's better to use `tempfile.TemporaryDirectory`. Using mkdtemp is an old approach and is often dangerous because the file is not deleted automatically. This is a small nit in tests, but there was one issues that caught my eye.
I want to cherry-pick it to 1.10  - with python 2.7 support, I considered TemporaryDirectory - but it won't work there I am afraid .
